data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 14,535 believers in Dumka, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dumka, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: There are 1,321,400 people living in the county of Dumka. Only about 14,535 might be believers.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Dumka. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,290,832, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Halwai Maira people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Dumka.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,321,400 people living in the county of Dumka.

data.section_summary:
the county of Dumka, Jharkhand, India has a population of 1,321,400.

We estimate Dumka has 14,535 people who might know Jesus, 16,033 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,290,832 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Dumka, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

location.name: Dumka
location.people_groups_list: Gandharb (Hindu traditions), Sardar (Muslim traditions), Mru, Kori, Angarok
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gandharb (Hindu traditions) (15,000), Sardar (Muslim traditions) (13,000), Mru (400), Kori (2,575,000), Angarok (6,700)
